body_html:
hi @pkmital - I came across your solution.

I'm running in the same problems.
``Library not loaded: @rpath/libcudart.7.5.dylib

In my case, I'm installing for Python 2.7.x; TensorFlow 0.10. Using TF's install instructions to download CUDA first (using homebrew, it automatically downloaded CUDA-8.0)

Is your solution for CUDA-8.0 or for CUDA-7.5?

Thanks!
